channel.title: CVE Feed for Brevo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brevo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35668|2024-06-05T05:15:36.450Z -- brevo -- newsletter%2C%20smtp%2C%20email%20marketing%20and%20subscribe%20forms%20by%20sendinblue
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brevo Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue: from n/a through 3.1.77.

item.title: CVE-2024-32807|2024-05-17T09:39:04.032Z -- brevo -- sendinblue%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Brevo Sendinblue for WooCommerce allows Relative Path Traversal, Manipulating Web Input to File System Calls.This issue affects Sendinblue for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.0.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-35668|2024-06-04T13:48:46.211Z -- brevo -- newsletter%2C%20smtp%2C%20email%20marketing%20and%20subscribe%20forms%20by%20sendinblue
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brevo Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue: from n/a through 3.1.77.
